title: Music database schema validation blocked (no Notion access)
description: Cannot validate Music Tracks / Music Artists schemas (and discover Music Playlists) because Notion access is unavailable in this session. Environment is network_access=restricted with no NOTION token configured, so required database queries, property/type checks, and relation integrity verification cannot run.
next_step: Provide NOTION_TOKEN and allow Notion network access (or run from an environment with credentials) so Music Tracks/Artists/Playlists schemas can be inspected, property alignment verified, and relations validated per 4-agent chain requirements.
